name: LOVEVOOK Carry On Luggage 22x14x9 Airline Approved, 22 Inch Softside Suitcases with Spinner Wheels, Lightweight Carry-on Suitcase with TSA Lock for Women Men, Large Luggage for Travel Business Trip
short_description: 【AIRLINE APPROVED DIMENSIONS】Measuring 22 x 14 x 9 inches (Includes wheels), case dimensions: 18.7 x 14 x 9 inches, weighing 6.9 pounds, this lightweight carry on luggage fits perfectly in the overhead bin of most airlines. Ideal for your business trip and stress-free travel.

【Durable & Smooth-Silent Mobility】Made from premium water- and scratch-resistant polyester, this soft carry-on luggage withstands travel rigors. Its 360° silent spinner wheels feature a precision shaft and thickened design for wear resistance, quiet operation, and superior load capacity.

【Spacious & Well-Organized】 This travel luggage is thoughtfully designed with a dedicated waterproof wet pocket to separate damp items, a roomy main compartment with secure adjustable straps, plus 3 front compartments and 1 side pocket—keeping all your travel essentials neatly arranged and easily accessible throughout your journey.

【FRONT LAPTOP COMPARTMENT】The exterior laptop compartment provides quick, hassle-free access to your 15.6'' laptop and tablet, featuring a padded sleeve for extra protection while maintaining a sleek profile, making your rolling carry-on suitcase an indispensable companion for business trips and on-the-go workspace solutions.

【Premium Accessories】The smooth yet durable heavy-duty zipper with reinforced teeth prevents bursting, the TSA-approved combination lock ensures security and convenience, multi-level ergonomic telescopic handle for customized height, top and side grab handles provide versatile carrying alternatives.

【Exceptional Customer Support】At LOVEVOOK, we combine rigorous quality testing with outstanding care. Every suitcase exceeds industry standards, ensuring reliability for all your travels. Should questions arise, our dedicated team provides prompt solutions—because your journey deserves confidence from trusted quality.

short_description: Flexible Size & Set Options for Every Trip: Choose the 22” expandable carry-on alone, the 3-piece travel set (22” carry-on + 15” boarding tote + 10” travel kit), or the complete 5-piece set including 30”, 26”, and 22” suitcases with matching travel accessories

product_description: The Chicago Collection is built for travelers who want dependable performance, smart organization, and flexible options for every trip. Choose from a 22” expandable carry-on, a coordinated 3-piece travel set, or the complete 5-piece luggage system designed to cover everything from quick getaways to extended travel. Durable ABS hardside construction protects your belongings while remaining lightweight and easy to maneuver, and smooth 360° spinner wheels paired with a push-button telescoping handle ensure effortless mobility. Expandable compartments provide extra packing space when needed, while the included boarding tote and travel kit add convenience, organization, and seamless stacking for travel days that move fast.

name: BAGSMART Carry On Luggage 19 L x14 W x9 H Airline Approved with Spinner Wheels, Lightweight 20 Inch Luggage with TSA Lock, Expandable Hard Shell Carry On Suitcases for Men Women, Royal Blue
short_description: Airline-Approved Boarding Size: 20 inch carry on luggage meets most airline requirements for overhead compartments. Suitcases with wheels are suitable for 3-5 day trips, air, train and bus travel. Travel luggage is upgraded with double-ended zippers and side-mounted TSA-approved locks to ensure smooth and hassle-free airline baggage screening for carry on suitcase measuring 19 L x14 W x9 H inches with spinner wheels and handle. It has a volume of 35 liters and weighs only 6.83 lbs.

20% Upgraded Bigger Expandable Design: The checked luggage is ingeniously designed with two main compartments and features the buckle compression system, keeping your clothes neatly arranged. The travel suitcase comes with a zippered mesh pocket for quick access to essentials, and a built-in small pocket for small items. Pulling open the zipper can expand by 1.6 inches, adding an extra 7L of space, with a large capacity of 42L, helping you pack more items and keep your travel items organized.

Excellent Craftsmanship: This hard shell carry on luggage is made of 100%PC for exceptional strength, flexibility, and lightness. The underseat carry on luggage with wheels has passed the shock drop test. The hard shell luggage texture is extremely scratch-resistant and not easily scratched, keeping the hard case luggage looking great on trip after trip.

Superior Maneuverability: The rolling suitcase buttery smooth 360° swivel wheels are extremely quiet and durable, making it easy to navigate through airports, train platforms, sidewalks, and even cobblestone streets. The travel luggage has been upgraded with a sturdy and smooth four-level adjustable aluminum handle with multiple height options for your comfort. Soft silicone handles on the top and sides of the hard shell suitcases have been added to make the lightweight suitcase easier to lift.

Premium Service And Warranty: BAGSMART will back each piece of tsa approved carry on luggage with a 5-year manufacturer's warranty. Before shipment, hard sided luggage with spinner wheels undergoes thousands of rigorous tests to ensure that our luggage meets strict standards and can withstand any journey. If there is any quality problem, please feel free to contact us. Professional and patient customer service will reply to your satisfaction in time.
